refnamediv.refpurpose: 把文件指针处的剩余的数据全部输出

refsect1.title: 描述
refsect1.simpara: 按文件指针从当前的位置读取到EOF（End of file）并把结果写到输出缓冲器。
如果发生错误， fpassthru 就会返回 &false;。 否则， fpassthru 就返回从 handle 字符数目以及传递到标准输出。
文件指针必须有效，且必须成功打开由 fopen， popen，或 fsockopen 指定的文件。 如果你已经向文件夹写入了数据，你必须使用 rewind 来重设文件指针到文件的开头。 当 fpassthru 读完文件后，就会关闭指针关闭 handle ）。
If you just want to dump the contents of a file to the output buffer, without first modifying it or seeking to a particular offset, you may want to use the readfile, which saves you the fopen call.

note.para: When using fpassthru on a binary file on Windows systems, you should make sure to open the file in binary mode by appending a b to the mode used in the call to fopen.
You are encouraged to use the b flag when dealing with binary files, even if your system does not require it, so that your scripts will be more portable.

refsect1.simpara: See also readfile, fopen, popen, and fsockopen
